channel.title: Sterility on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Sterility on COTTON

item.title: GhAOC2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A08G004050.1 Gene Symbol: GhAOC2A Gene Name: allene oxide cyclase 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Expression analysis of the GhAOC2 gene in HT-sensitive line (H05) and HT-tolerant line (84021) anthers at TS under NT and HT.

item.title: GhAOC2D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_D08G004260.1 Gene Symbol: GhAOC2D Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Expression analysis of the GhAOC2 gene in HT-sensitive line (H05) and HT-tolerant line (84021) anthers at TS under NT and HT.

item.title: GhCKI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCKI Gene Name: Gossypium hirsutum Casein kinase I Genome: TM-1 reference genome TM-1 Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCKI DNA methylation are all involved in HT-induced male sterility in cotton.

item.title: GhFAD2–3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A11G2814 Gene Symbol: GhFAD2–3 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhFAD2–3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D11G3169 Gene Symbol: GhFAD2–3 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhMYB4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A12G003840 Gene Symbol: GhMYB4 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome TM-1 Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: In the tapetum of early-stage cotton anthers, upregulated expression of GhMYB4 under HT and overexpressed GhMYB4 under normal temperature both led to severe male sterility phenotypes, coupled with enhanced expression of GhCKI.

item.title: GhMYB66
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_D08G018460 Gene Symbol: GhMYB66 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhMYB66 interacts with GhMYB4 and promotes its binding to ProGhCKI.
